subject: Television
Basketball
lead_paragraph: The Boston Celtics’ win over the Los Angeles Lakers in Game 2 of the N.B.A. finals attracted an average of 15.5 million viewers, up from the 14.1 million for the comparable game last year.
snippet: The Boston Celtics’ win over the Los Angeles Lakers in Game 2 of the N.B.A. finals attracted an average of 15.5 million viewers, up from the 14.1 million for the comparable game last year.
